buildCommand: mkdir -p out && ROOT=$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel 2>/dev/null || pwd) && if [ -d "$ROOT/src/main/webapp" ]; then cp -a "$ROOT/src/main/webapp/." out/; elif [ -d "$ROOT/public" ]; then cp -a "$ROOT/public/." out/; else DIR=$(find "$ROOT" -maxdepth 6 -type f -name index.html -print | head -n 1 | xargs -r dirname) && [ -n "$DIR" ] && cp -a "$DIR/." out/ || (echo 'No web assets directory found.' && exit 1); fi
